channel.title: docker on swimminghao
channel.description: Recent content in docker on swimminghao

item.title: Dockerfile
item.description: Docker相关指令 docker镜像运行以及日志 ❯ docker run --restart=always -d --name holer-client -e PARAMS="www.swimminghao.top 6060 51c45156bf1c4a82b4e6ffff2150b65e" swimminghao/holer-client:latest ❯ docker run -d --name holer-server --restart=always --network=host -p 600:600 -p 6060:6060 -p 6443:6443 -p 11000-11010:11000-11010 swimminghao/holer-server:latest ❯ docker logs -f 1ed9a5d6f0cc Dockerfile 打包jar成docke
